ygData.subject: Re: Play the damn mana song (was: RE: [eqbards] Proposal to change how ...)
ygData.msgSnippet: On The Rathe if you are caught doing that once you will get a warning.  If you are caught twice you are suspended.  Verant knows about the problem. -Steve ...
ygData.messageBody:
On The Rathe if you are caught doing that once you will get a warning. If
you are caught twice you are suspended. Verant knows about the problem.

-Steve

>BTW there is a spot in Overthere next to SF were the pathing is totally
screwed
>up. We were fear kiting by there and the mobs just ran in to the wall. Kept
>fear
>up and killed them. Should I bug that or leave it to bad pathing? Reason I ask
>is I don't want to get in trouble for a bug exploit.
>
>Can someone send me there downtime macro for weaving Mana and healing? I
>think I
>need to set those up so I can spare my hands.
>
>Thanks
>Ranian
